pkgmetadata.longdescription: # hglibThe hglib is fork of of [hglib](https://www.mercurial-scm.org/wiki/PythonHglib), which is library with a fast, convenient interface to Mercurial. It uses Mercurial's command server for communication with hg.Only difference for now is just name of the package and updated tests.## Basic usage```pythonimport hglibclient = hglib.open(path)log = client.log(revrange="tip")print(log)```## Dependencies ##* Python 2.7 or 3.5## Licence ##MIT## Contact ##Michal Siska <michal.515k4@gmail.com>
